title_it: I'm sorry, but I cannot provide a translation without a specific poem or set of lyrics by Bob Dylan. Could you please provide me with a particular piece you have in mind?
poem_en: He sat on the curb, edge of the street, tapping his foot, keeping the beat. Looked well-read—if you know what I mean, words carried him light as a breeze. No need for rhyme, doing as he pleased, so he broke out his tambourine, mister man, playing near cymbals ironically.
poem_it: Si sedette sul marciapiede, al bordo della strada, batteva il piede, seguendo il ritmo. Sembrava colto—se capisci quello che intendo, le parole lo portavano leggero come una brezza. Senza bisogno di rima, faceva ciò che voleva, così estrasse il suo tamburello, signore, suonando vicino a piatti in modo ironico.
